FuncDef: The reset tcp ipv6 statistics command clears IPv6 TCP packet statistics.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Before collecting the IPv6 TCP packet statistics in a specified period, you need to run the reset tcp ipv6 statistics command to clear previous IPv6 TCP packet statistics. After that, run the display tcp ipv6 statistics command to view IPv6 TCP packet statistics.
Configuration Impact
The reset tcp ipv6 statistics command is used to clear IPv6 TCP packet statistics. Therefore, confirm the action before running this command.
Precautions
The reset tcp ipv6 statistics command clears IPv6 TCP packet statistics on all installed interface boards.
